title: 2002 Anime Logo
content:
Hi,  
I submitted this over at whatthefont a few days ago but have had no responses. I would like to also identify the small text that's inset at the top left, (not the kanji of course) but I can submit a larger sample for that if it's too small here. Thanks for any help you can give.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [typo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819005347/http:/typophile.com/files/typo_24.jpg) | 63.41 KB |
author: akovia

comments.content: It's so extremely skewed, it's difficult to tell, but Eurostile might be a good match...

Thanks for the try. I might just have to trace this one.  
Cheers

[Serpentine](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819005347/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/serpentine/alternate_cuts.html) für »Gundam«. Eurostile for »Gundam seed«. »Destiny« reminds me of a skewed [Aster](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819005347/http:/www.identifont.com/show?DY5).
